short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Storm enables hotkeys for military gameplay on NationStates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Storm is an extension for military gameplay on the NationStates website. It makes frequently used actions more convenient by assigning hotkeys to them.
